item.title: Nginx常用配置
item.description: Nginx常用配置 常用代理Server配置 server { listen 80; //监听的本地端口 server_name localhost; location /api1/ { proxy_pass http://localhost:8080; } # http://localhost/api1/xxx -> http://localhost:8080/api1/xxx; location /api2/ { proxy_pass http://localhost:8080/; } # http://localhost/api2/xxx -> http://localhost:8080/xxx; location /api3 { proxy_pass http://localhost:8080; } # http://localhost/api3/xxx -> http://localhost:8080/api3/xxx; location /api4 { proxy_pass
